q1.question: How long does website development take?
q1.answer: It depends on the project scale, but typically STANDARD takes 2-3 weeks, DELUXE takes 4-6 weeks, and PREMIUM takes 6-8 weeks.

q2.question: Are there any additional costs?
q2.answer: If additional features or pages beyond the basic package are needed, quotes will be provided through separate consultation. All additional costs will be communicated in advance.

q3.question: Can I make revisions after development?
q3.answer: All plans include 2-3 revision opportunities during the development process, and post-completion modifications are possible through maintenance services.

q4.question: How are domain and hosting handled?
q4.answer: You can prepare them yourself, or we can arrange and set them up for you. Details will be provided through consultation.
